Seconds per percent (additional info on guts regen)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Seconds per percent (additional info on guts regen)
By mepersoner on Sunday, June 9, 2002 - 11:47 pm:

Thanks to Richard Ryley for the numbers for guts factor and guts speed. This will be double posted at m-r.com.

At 99 guts a monster gets a certain boost in % from guts factor. It also takes a certain amount of time to get there. This is the time/% (not decimal, actual percent). This will give a value, which when lower, is better. I will list it in order of what has the better guts. Some are approximated. As a note, most specials are not included as I do not have date for them, but those that I do, are.

Summed up: It takes this many seconds for the monsters hit % to rise 1%.

Value|Monster types

2.2|Metalner,Loveseeker.

2.619|Pixie, Futurity, Serenity, Springer, Ghost.

2.973|Jilt, Mint, Baby Doll, Metal Glay, Daton, Fairy Hopper, Skipper, Hopper, Metazorl, Plant, Ducken.

3|Janne, Lepus, Nagisa, Night Flyer, Peachtreebug, Mono-eyed, Cabalos, Emerald Eye, Rear Eyed, Sneak Hopper, Woody hopper.

3.03|Granity, Angel, Kitten, Snowy, Silhouette, Ferious, Celious, Sloth Beetle, Ducklon, Petit Knight, Bakky, Tricker, Fairy Saurian, Hound Saurian, Aloha Saurian, Lesziena, Metal Glory, Datonare, Hare Hound, Jelly Hound, Terror Dog, Snow Hopper.

3.26|Techno Dragon, Crab Dragon, Gariel, Oscerot, Moo, Tyrant, Dagon, Amenhotep, Pressure, Black Golem, Golem, Arrowhead, Dracto Kato, Zilla.

3.3|Daina, Colorpandora, Huey, Draco Doll, Henger Doll, Naga Saurian, Hound Knight, Balon, Draco Hopper, Mustachios, Leaf Hare, Fairy Hare, Mum Mew.

3.33|Unico, Dixie, Jinnee, Vanity, Lilim, Dryad, Allure, Tiger, Tropical Dog, White Hound, Pink Hopper.

3.37| Tiamat, Melcarba, Eggplantern, Automaton, Wracky, Pink Golem, Mariomax, Big Blue, Ecologuardia, Spot Saurian, Hachiro, Shell Saurian, Hercules, Durahan, Garuda, Genocider, Scaled Hare, Four Eyed, Fanged Mask, Blue Kato, Pink Zilla, Gooji, Phoenix, Cinder Bird.

3.44| Centaur, Beaclon, Henger, Strong Horn, Scaled Golem, Battle Rocks, Dao, Titan, Angolomor, Poseidon, Wood Golem, Vesuvius, Kelmadics, Ruby Knight, Plated Arrow, Rocky Fur, Prince Hare, Evil Hare, Gontar, Baku, Nussie, Aqua Mask, Brown Mask, Gigalon.

3.47| Dragon, Stone Dragon, Ragnaroks.

3.54| Hound Dragon, Dragoon, Trojan, Antares, Bethelgeus, Rocklon, Omega, End Bringer, Marble Guy, Salamander, Rock Saurian, Crab Saurian, Noble Saurian, Tasman, Black Saurian, Lorica, Mustard Arrow, Selketo, Log Sawer, Hare, Jelly Hare, Wild Hare, War Baku, Baku Clown, Giga Pint, Scaled Mask, Suezo Mask, Purple Mask, Citrone, Pink Kato, Tainted Cat, Eared Mew, Mew, Aqua Mew.

3.59| Chariot, Bazoo, Reaper, Liquid Cube, Centurion, KautRoarKaut, Jaggernaught, Pebbly, Mocky, Satan Claws, Zuum, Sand Saurian, Mustardy, Basilisk, Jelly Saurian, Wood Saurian, Wood Knight, Rock Hound (that's right HR), Terror Dog, Pulsar, Purple Hare, Icebergy, Pink Mask, Colorful, All Bajarls, Bowwow.

3.64|Corkasus, Armor Dragon, Dodongo, Death Dragon, Garlant, Gaia, Black Henger, Skeleton, Gobi, Moaigon, Sleepyhead, Magna, Renocraft, Priarocks, Magmax, Higante, Stone Mask, Gali, Galirous, Gordish, Kato.

As you can see, Metalners are horrendously overpowered, and Loveseekers. The next step down is also overpowered, but can be delt with...
